title: Cubs/White Sox/ Suhling / $ in Shield PC for trade
author: timn1

posts.post_title: Cubs/White Sox/ Suhling / $ in Shield PC for trade
posts.post_content:
* Also interested in outright purchases for $$ if you have anything I need *

This set has many names but few copies around.  I would love to swap (or swap + cash) this Reulbach for another one I need in this set or another PC set such as:

Suhling/$ in Shield Postcards: Cubs: Brown, Cubs Team, Kling, Pfiester, Sheckard
White Sox: Altrock, Davis, Comiskey, Donohue, Dougherty, Isbell, Jones  

Ullman Fitzgerald, Gilbert, H. Mathewson, Cubs Team
 
Wolverine - Crawford [portrait], Jennings [“Manager”]
   
Morgan “Red Belt” Postcards  - Opening of the Season (i know, dream on...)

H. M. Taylor Postcards - Crawford, Donovan [floral horseshoe]

Charles Denby - English, Hornsby

1908 Detroit Free Press - need most

Souvenir Shop of Cleveland - need most

Rotograph: all except the team composite 

American League Publishing Co. - Bay, Berger, Clarkson, Flick, Joss, Nill, Perring, Rhoades    TEAMS: Cardinals, Naps, Tigers, White Sox

Topping - Crawford, Jennings, D. Jones, McIntyre, Moriarty, O’Leary, Schaefer, Schmidt, Speer, Works

Hull White Sox - Altrock, Donahue, Hahn, Isbell, Jones, McFarland, Owen, Patterson, Sullivan, Tannehill, Walsh, White

Raymond Kahn - Naps Team

Brush Auto - need most 



...and other player postcard sets.  

If you're not sure, write me with what you have.   

Thanks!
